languages.text: {n}Прищурившись, Владайм бросает на вас спокойный оценивающий взгляд, а потом опускается на колени. Его непривычное к подобным проявлениям покорности тело движется медленно, словно воздух стал густым.{/n} "Если это — плата за процветание станции, то я ее заплачу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Прищурившись, Владайм бросает на вас спокойный оценивающий взгляд, а потом опускается на колени. Его непривычное к подобным проявлениям покорности тело движется медленно, словно воздух стал густым.{/n} "Если это — плата за процветание станции, то я ее заплачу".

languages.text: {n}Vladaym's eyes narrow as he gives you a calm, appraising look, then kneels. His body, unaccustomed to such displays of obedience, moves slowly as if the air has suddenly grown thick.{/n} "If this is the price for the station's prosperity, I will pay it."
languages.original_text: {n}Прищурившись, Владайм бросает на вас спокойный оценивающий взгляд, а потом опускается на колени. Его непривычное к подобным проявлениям покорности тело движется медленно, словно воздух стал густым.{/n} "Если это — плата за процветание станции, то я ее заплачу".

{n}Vladaym's eyes narrow as he gives you a calm, appraising look, then kneels. His body, unaccustomed to such displays of obedience, moves slowly as if the air has suddenly grown thick.{/n} "If this is the price for the station's prosperity, I will pay it."

{n}Vladaym's eyes narrow as he gives you a calm, appraising look, then kneels. His body, unaccustomed to such displays of obedience, moves slowly as if the air has suddenly grown thick.{/n} "If this is the price for the station's prosperity, I will pay it."

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは目を細めて、こちらに落ち着いた品定めするような視線を送り、ひざまずく。そのような服従の表現に慣れていない彼の体は、まるで空気が突然重くなったようにゆっくりと動く。{/n}「これがステーションの繁栄に必要な代償ならば払おう」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's eyes narrow as he gives you a calm, appraising look, then kneels. His body, unaccustomed to such displays of obedience, moves slowly as if the air has suddenly grown thick.{/n} "If this is the price for the station's prosperity, I will pay it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは目を細めて、こちらに落ち着いた品定めするような視線を送り、ひざまずく。そのような服従の表現に慣れていない彼の体は、まるで空気が突然重くなったようにゆっくりと動く。{/n}「これがステーションの繁栄に必要な代償ならば払おう」

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆眯起眼睛，冷静地打量着你，随后跪在了地上。很显然，他的身体并不习惯于这样的服从。他屈膝的动作非常缓慢，仿佛空气突然变得黏稠一般。{/n}“如果是为了落脚港的繁荣，我愿意付出这样的代价。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's eyes narrow as he gives you a calm, appraising look, then kneels. His body, unaccustomed to such displays of obedience, moves slowly as if the air has suddenly grown thick.{/n} "If this is the price for the station's prosperity, I will pay it."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆眯起眼睛，冷静地打量着你，随后跪在了地上。很显然，他的身体并不习惯于这样的服从。他屈膝的动作非常缓慢，仿佛空气突然变得黏稠一般。{/n}“如果是为了落脚港的繁荣，我愿意付出这样的代价。”

languages.text: {n}Vladaym entrecierra los ojos, te mira con calma y se arrodilla. Su cuerpo, poco acostumbrado a tales muestras de obediencia, se mueve lentamente, como si de repente costara respirar.{/n} «Si este es el precio de la prosperidad de la estación, que así sea».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's eyes narrow as he gives you a calm, appraising look, then kneels. His body, unaccustomed to such displays of obedience, moves slowly as if the air has suddenly grown thick.{/n} "If this is the price for the station's prosperity, I will pay it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym entrecierra los ojos, te mira con calma y se arrodilla. Su cuerpo, poco acostumbrado a tales muestras de obediencia, se mueve lentamente, como si de repente costara respirar.{/n} «Si este es el precio de la prosperidad de la estación, que así sea».

languages.text: {n}Les yeux plissés, Vladaym vous lance un regard calme et critique, puis se met à genoux. Ses mouvements sont lents, comme si l'air avait soudain épaissi, indiquant qu'il n'a pas l'habitude de s'abaisser à ce genre d'avilissement.{/n} « Si c'est le prix à payer pour assurer la prospérité de la station, je suis prêt à m'y soumettre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's eyes narrow as he gives you a calm, appraising look, then kneels. His body, unaccustomed to such displays of obedience, moves slowly as if the air has suddenly grown thick.{/n} "If this is the price for the station's prosperity, I will pay it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux plissés, Vladaym vous lance un regard calme et critique, puis se met à genoux. Ses mouvements sont lents, comme si l'air avait soudain épaissi, indiquant qu'il n'a pas l'habitude de s'abaisser à ce genre d'avilissement.{/n} « Si c'est le prix à payer pour assurer la prospérité de la station, je suis prêt à m'y soumettre. »

languages.text: {n}Vladayms Augen verengen sich, er mustert dich ruhig und sinkt dann auf die Knie. Sein Körper ist derlei Gesten des Gehorsams nicht gewohnt und bewegt sich langsam, als wäre die Luft plötzlich dick geworden.{/n} "Wenn das der Preis für das Wohlbefinden der Station ist, werde ich ihn bezahlen."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's eyes narrow as he gives you a calm, appraising look, then kneels. His body, unaccustomed to such displays of obedience, moves slowly as if the air has suddenly grown thick.{/n} "If this is the price for the station's prosperity, I will pay it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladayms Augen verengen sich, er mustert dich ruhig und sinkt dann auf die Knie. Sein Körper ist derlei Gesten des Gehorsams nicht gewohnt und bewegt sich langsam, als wäre die Luft plötzlich dick geworden.{/n} "Wenn das der Preis für das Wohlbefinden der Station ist, werde ich ihn bezahlen."

languages.text: {n}Vladaym sana sakin, düşünceli bir bakış atarken gözleri kısılıyor ve ardından diz çöküyor. Bu tür itaat gösterilerine alışık olmayan vücudu, sanki hava aniden yoğunlaşmış gibi yavaş hareket ediyor.{/n} "İstasyonun refahının bedeli buysa öderim."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's eyes narrow as he gives you a calm, appraising look, then kneels. His body, unaccustomed to such displays of obedience, moves slowly as if the air has suddenly grown thick.{/n} "If this is the price for the station's prosperity, I will pay it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym sana sakin, düşünceli bir bakış atarken gözleri kısılıyor ve ardından diz çöküyor. Bu tür itaat gösterilerine alışık olmayan vücudu, sanki hava aniden kalınlaşmış gibi yavaş hareket ediyor.{/n} "İstasyonun refahının bedeli buysa öderim."
